topic.title: Updates to HPE Helion OpenStack 2.0 Documentation

section.p: The HPE Helion OpenStack documentation team continuously updates the documents in this web deliverable. These updates include anything from fixes for minor typos or style issues, to more significant changes such as bug fixes, additions, or deletions. The following table shows the significant changes made to this content.

row.entry: Added TLS steps required for Private CA certificates (Link and Link)
Added Swift meters to Ceilometer default meter list (Link)
Added note about meters avalable from the Metric option (Link)
Added web browser support information to the Horizon Overview (Link)

Added steps for Neutron service logging level configuration (Link)
Added step to ensure new Compute nodes that you add to your environment are included in monitoring (Link) Added step to ensure new Ceph monitor nodes that you add to your environment are included in monitoring (Link)
